summary: An ice skater (Matt Lanter) and his new partner (Francia Raisa) develop feelings for each other while training to compete in Paris.
cast: Matt Lanter|Francia Raisa|Sarah Gadon|Stefano DiMatteo|Benjamin Hollingsworth|Luis Oliva|Aly Purrott-Armstrong|Christy Carlson Romano|Stephanie Valois|Rod Black|Lori Graham|Marcela Pizarro|Marco Ledezma|Lucinda Davis|Danny Blanco Hall|France Viens|Adrianne Richards|Vlasta Vrana|Jennifer Rae Westley|Nina Fillis|Marie-Pier Séguin
title: Pasión por el triunfo 3
